title: What should I do in Input?
content:
Provide input folder for Taxon Identification. The input folder must contain a taxon-by-character matrix in CSV (Comma Separated Values) format.

If you don't have files in that format, you can run Text Capture and Matrix Generation in sequence to generate such files.

If you have an appropriate input file on your local computer, upload input file.

If you have a folder generated by Matrix Generation on ETC site, select an existing folder.

title: Create Input Files
content: If you don't have taxon-by-character matrix in CSV (Comma Separated Values) format, run Text Capture and Matrix Generation in sequence to generate such files.

title: Upload Input Files
content:
If you have an appropriate taxon-by-character matrix in CSV (Comma Separated Values) format on your local computer, use Upload Input Files option.

First Create a New Folder or Select an Existing Folder.

Then click on Upload Input Files button.

title: Select an Existing Folder
content:
If you have a folder generated by Matrix Generation on ETC site, use Select Existing Folder option.

Click on Select Folder button to select a Matrix Generation output folder, which has _output_by_MG_ in the folder name.
